entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
